name: The Munchies: Avoid the Poop
description:
Peter Pig has the Munchies. He’s on the run from the farmer and hasn’t eaten in a while.

Then one day he stumbled across a magical field where it rains junk food … and poo.

It is your job to help the very tired Peter catch the food and avoid the poo. Move him left or right so he’s in the perfect spot.

You can catch cheese, fries, burgers, ice pops, donuts and birthday cake – it really is a very strange field.

You need to help him find and eat food but not poo.

He can handle three hits from a poo but after that he’s done for so help fill him up and continue his adventure.
